title: MSSQL Limitation
author: Cool34000
body_snippet:
Hi,

Is there a limitation on how many connections can be stored when using MSSQL database?
I'm facing a strange issue where an import of an XML connection file is not saved when I exit mRemoteNG.
Of course, I have RW access to the DB and I checked the DB: it's not full or in RO mode.

mRemoteNG v1.76.20

comments.snippet: hello, where is some reports about db work incorrectly, but at the moment have no fix for such, but i am looking to improve db side work, so technically it should be no limits in amount at all.
comments.author: Kvarkas
